languages.text: "Шерин, свет очей моих! Я счастлива видеть вас среди нас вновь! Великий воистину милосерден, коли указал вам путь домой и к нам. Надеюсь, все ашмаги, что обрекли нас на прозябание без Лорд-капитана, уже кормят демонов в варпе!"

"Shereen, light of my eyes! I am overjoyed to see you among us once more! Truly, the Exalted One is merciful for showing you the way back home. I hope all the ashmags who left us to languish without our Lord Captain have already become food for the warp daemons!"
languages.original_text: "Шерин, свет очей моих! Я счастлива видеть вас среди нас вновь! Великий воистину милосерден, коли указал вам путь домой и к нам. Надеюсь, все ашмаги, что обрекли нас на прозябание без Лорд-капитана, уже кормят демонов в варпе!"

traits.locale_text: "Shereen, light of my eyes! I am overjoyed to see you among us once more! Truly the Exalted One is merciful for showing you the way back home. I hope all the ashmags who left us to languish without our Lord Captain have already become food for the warp daemons!"

"Shereen, light of my eyes! I am overjoyed to see you among us once more! Truly the Exalted One is merciful for showing you the way back home. I hope all the ashmags who left us to languish without our Lord Captain have already become food for the warp daemons!"

"Shereen, light of my eyes! I am overjoyed to see you among us once more! Truly, the Exalted One is merciful for showing you the way back home. I hope all the ashmags who left us to languish without our Lord Captain have already become food for the warp daemons!"

"Shereen, light of my eyes! I am overjoyed to see you among us once more! Truly, the Exalted One is merciful for showing you the way back home. I hope all the ashmags who left us to languish without our Lord Captain have already become food for the warp daemons!"

"Shereen, light of my eyes! I am overjoyed to see you among us once more! Truly, the Exalted One is merciful for showing you the way back home. I hope all the ashmags who left us to languish without our Lord Captain have already become food for the warp daemons!"

languages.text: “亲爱的！我眼中的明光！看到你又回到了我们中间，实在是让我雀跃不已！至高无上的神皇非常仁慈，为你指明了回来的路。那群坏种绑架了你，让我们失去了舰长大人！希望那群混蛋已经变成了亚空间恶魔的晚餐！”
languages.original_text: "Shereen, light of my eyes! I am overjoyed to see you among us once more! Truly, the Exalted One is merciful for showing you the way back home. I hope all the ashmags who left us to languish without our Lord Captain have already become food for the warp daemons!"

traits.locale_text: “亲爱的！我眼中的明光！看到你又回到了我们中间，实在是让我雀跃不已！至高无上的神皇非常仁慈，为你指明了回来的路。那群坏种绑架了你，让我们失去了舰长大人！希望那群混蛋已经变成了亚空间恶魔的晚餐！”

languages.text: "Shereen, Licht meiner Augen! Ich bin überglücklich, Euch wieder unter uns zu sehen! Wahrlich, der Erhabene ist gnädig, dass er Euch den Weg zurück nach Hause gewiesen hat. Ich hoffe, all die Ashmags, die uns ohne unseren Lord Captain haben darben lassen, sind bereits zu Futter für die Warpdämonen geworden!"
languages.original_text: "Shereen, light of my eyes! I am overjoyed to see you among us once more! Truly, the Exalted One is merciful for showing you the way back home. I hope all the ashmags who left us to languish without our Lord Captain have already become food for the warp daemons!"

traits.locale_text: "Shereen, Licht meiner Augen! Ich bin überglücklich, Euch wieder unter uns zu sehen! Wahrlich, der Erhabene ist gnädig, dass er Euch den Weg zurück nach Hause gewiesen hat. Ich hoffe, all die Ashmags, die uns ohne unseren Lord Captain haben darben lassen, sind bereits zu Futter für die Warpdämonen geworden!"

languages.text: « Shereen, lumière de mes yeux ! Quelle joie de vous avoir de nouveau parmi nous ! Loué soit l'Exalté pour avoir eu la bonté de vous montrer le chemin du retour. J'espère que tous les ashmags responsables de l'absence de notre {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ont déjà été transformés en pâtée pour démons du Warp ! »
languages.original_text: "Shereen, light of my eyes! I am overjoyed to see you among us once more! Truly, the Exalted One is merciful for showing you the way back home. I hope all the ashmags who left us to languish without our Lord Captain have already become food for the warp daemons!"

traits.locale_text: « Shereen, lumière de mes yeux ! Quelle joie de vous avoir de nouveau parmi nous ! Loué soit l'Exalté pour avoir eu la bonté de vous montrer le chemin du retour. J'espère que tous les ashmags responsables de l'absence de notre {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ont déjà été transformés en pâtée pour démons du Warp ! »

languages.text: «¡Shereen, luz de mis ojos! ¡No quepo en mí de alegría al volver a verl{mf|o|a} entre nosotros! En verdad, el Exaltado ha sido compasivo al revelarle el camino a casa. ¡Espero que todos los ashmags responsables de dejarnos sin Lord Capitán todo este tiempo hayan sido pasto de los daemons de la disformidad!».
languages.original_text: "Shereen, light of my eyes! I am overjoyed to see you among us once more! Truly, the Exalted One is merciful for showing you the way back home. I hope all the ashmags who left us to languish without our Lord Captain have already become food for the warp daemons!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Shereen, luz de mis ojos! ¡No quepo en mí de alegría al volver a verl{mf|o|a} entre nosotros! En verdad, el Exaltado ha sido compasivo al revelarle el camino a casa. ¡Espero que todos los ashmags responsables de dejarnos sin Lord Capitán todo este tiempo hayan sido pasto de los daemons de la disformidad!».

languages.text: 「シャリーン、私の光！あんたがまた仲間になってくれて嬉しいよ！エグザルテッド・ワンは慈悲深くも、あんたを故郷まで導いて下さった。ロード・キャプテン不在のままアタシたちを置き去りにしたアッシュマグたども、すでに〈歪み〉のディーモンたちの餌食になっていることを願うよ！」
languages.original_text: "Shereen, light of my eyes! I am overjoyed to see you among us once more! Truly, the Exalted One is merciful for showing you the way back home. I hope all the ashmags who left us to languish without our Lord Captain have already become food for the warp daemons!"

traits.locale_text: 「シャリーン、私の光！あんたがまた仲間になってくれて嬉しいよ！エグザルテッド・ワンは慈悲深くも、あんたを故郷まで導いて下さった。ロード・キャプテン不在のままアタシたちを置き去りにしたアッシュマグたども、すでに〈歪み〉のディーモンたちの餌食になっていることを願うよ！」

languages.text: "Şirinim, iki gözüm! Aramıza tekrar katıldığını görmek ne hoş! Görkemli'nin merhametine şükürler olsun, seni yuvana ulaştırdı. Bizi Lord Kaptanımıza hasret bırakan o külboğazların hepsi öteboyut iblislerine yem olmuştur umarım!"
languages.original_text: "Shereen, light of my eyes! I am overjoyed to see you among us once more! Truly, the Exalted One is merciful for showing you the way back home. I hope all the ashmags who left us to languish without our Lord Captain have already become food for the warp daemons!"
